about.description1: AWA specializes in bringing premium Japanese motorcycles to riders around the globe. We source high-quality bikes, provide comprehensive inspections, and handle every detail from bidding to delivery.
about.description2: With our transparent pricing, secure payment system, and global shipping network, owning your dream Japanese motorcycle has never been easier.

howItWorks.title: How AWA Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to your dream bike
howItWorks.step1Desc: Explore our curated selection of premium Japanese motorcycles with detailed photos and inspection reports.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Place your bid on the motorcycle you want. Our transparent auction system ensures fair pricing.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Secure your motorcycle and complete payment through our secure system with full transparency on all fees.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Track your bike's journey and receive it at your doorstep with complete documentation and support.

features.title: Why Choose AWA
features.subtitle: Premium service for every motorcycle purchase
features.qualityDesc: Comprehensive vehicle reports and professional inspection for every motorcycle we list.
features.shippingDesc: Reliable delivery to over 120 countries with full tracking and insurance coverage.
features.pricingDesc: Best value Japanese motorcycles with transparent fees and no hidden costs.
features.paymentDesc: Bank-level encryption and secure escrow services for complete peace of mind.
features.biddingDesc: Real-time auction updates and instant notifications to keep you in the game.

howToBid.title: How to Bid
howToBid.subtitle: Our bidding system is transparent and easy to use. Learn how to place bids and win your dream vehicle.
howToBid.description: Learn how to bid on AWA Auction

types.title: Bidding Types
types.subtitle: AWA offers two types of bidding methods

live.title: Live Bidding
live.description: Bid in real-time as the auction happens. Fast-paced and exciting.

proxy.title: Proxy Bidding
proxy.description: Set your maximum price in advance. Our system bids for you incrementally.

increments.label: Bid Increments:
increments.text: Bids increase by fixed amounts (e.g., ¬•1,000 or ¬•10,000) depending on the current price.

sniper.label: Sniper Protection:
sniper.text: If a bid is placed in the last 5 minutes, the auction time is extended by 5 minutes to prevent last-second sniping.

binding.label: Binding Bids:
binding.text: All bids are legally binding contracts. Do not bid if you do not intend to purchase.

items.research: Research the market value of the vehicle before bidding.
items.budget: Set a strict budget including shipping and import taxes.
items.watchlist: Use the watchlist to track multiple items.

inspection.title: Inspection Reports
inspection.subtitle: Trust is our priority. Every vehicle undergoes a rigorous multi-point inspection by certified mechanics.

5.desc: Like New. Excellent condition with minimal signs of use.

4.desc: Good. Well maintained with minor cosmetic scratches.

3.desc: Average. Standard wear and tear for its age.

r.desc: Repaired. Has history of repairs or accidents.

bank.desc: Direct wire transfer to our Japanese bank account. Best for high-value transactions.

fees.title: Fees & Taxes

refunds.title: Refund Policy
refunds.subtitle: Clear guidelines on deposits and cancellations.

deposit.title: Deposit Refunds
deposit.desc: Deposits are fully refundable before bidding.

cancellation.title: Cancellations
cancellation.desc: Cancellations after winning bid incur a penalty fee.

verification.title: Account Verification
verification.subtitle: Complete KYC to unlock full bidding privileges.
verification.description: To maintain a safe and trustworthy trading environment, we require all users to complete identity verification (KYC). The process is simple and can be completed in three easy steps.

steps.idDesc: Upload a valid government-issued ID such as passport or driver's license.
steps.addressDesc: Submit a utility bill, bankstatement, or residence certificate showing your current address.
steps.phoneDesc: Verify your phone number by entering the authentication code sent via SMS.

whyKyc.title: Why Verification is Required
whyKyc.securityDesc: Prevent fraud and identity theft, providing a safe trading environment.
whyKyc.trustDesc: All verified users can trade with confidence knowing everyone is authenticated.
whyKyc.legalDesc: Comply with international regulations for money transfers and high-value transactions.

air.title: Air Freight
air.desc: The fastest option for urgent deliveries. Most expensive.

faq.q1: How do I register for an account?
faq.a1: Click on the 'Register' button at the top right corner. You'll need to provide your email, create a password, and verify your email address. For full access, you'll also need to complete KYC verification.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), Bank Wire Transfers, and PayPal for deposits.
faq.q3: Can I inspect the vehicles before bidding?
faq.a3: Yes, we provide detailed inspection reports and high-resolution photos for every vehicle. You can also request a video inspection or hire a third-party inspector through our partners.
faq.a4: Shipping times vary by destination. Typically, it takes 2-4 weeks for Asia, 4-6 weeks for Oceania and North America, and 6-8 weeks for Europe and Africa.
faq.q5: What if the vehicle is not as described?
faq.a5: We have a strict dispute resolution policy. If a vehicle significantly differs from the inspection report, please contact support within 48 hours of receiving the vehicle.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

info.hours: Business Hours: Mon-Fri 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM JST

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Connecting motorcycle enthusiasts worldwide with Japan's premium motorcycles

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the global leader in international motorcycle trade

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Exporting motorcycles from Japan is subject to various regulations and requirements. AWA handles all export documentation on behalf of buyers, ensuring compliance with both Japanese export laws and destination country import regulations.
overview.note: Note: Import duties and taxes are the responsibility of the buyer and vary by destination country.

certificate.title: Export Certificate
certificate.desc: Required for all vehicles exported from Japan. AWA obtains this on your behalf.

deregistration.title: Deregistration
deregistration.desc: Vehicle must be deregistered from Japanese roads before export.

customs.title: Customs Declaration
customs.desc: Full documentation of vehicle specifications and value for customs clearance.

preparation.title: Fuel & Battery
preparation.desc: Fuel tank must be drained and battery disconnected for maritime shipping.

uae.title: United Arab Emirates
items: GCC compliance certificate may be required

uk.title: United Kingdom
items: MOT test within 14 days of registration

usa.title: United States
items: Must be 25+ years old OR EPA/DOT compliant

australia.title: Australia
items: SEVS or RAWS approval required for newer models

prohibited.title: Prohibited & Restricted Items
prohibited.desc: The following items cannot be included in shipments:
items: Weapons or sharp objects stored in vehicle

contact.title: Need Help with Export?
contact.desc: Our export specialists are here to assist you.

intro.title: What are Cookies?
intro.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our platform.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.desc: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.desc: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.content: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Please note that removing or blocking cookies may impact your user experience and some functionality may no longer be available.
managing.browser: Browser Settings: Most browsers allow you to refuse or accept cookies and to delete existing cookies. Check your browser's help section for instructions.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services that also place cookies on your device:

contact.title: Questions about Cookies?
contact.content: Contact our privacy team for more information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:

items.personal: Personal identification (name, address, ID documents for KYC)

items.communicate: Communicate about your orders and account
items.improve: Improve our services and prevent fraud

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with:

items.logistics: Shipping and logistics partners (to deliver your purchases)

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using the AWA Auction Platform ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use our Service.

registration.title: 2. User Registration
registration.content: To participate in auctions, you must create an account and complete our KYC (Know Your Customer) verification process. You agree to provide accurate information and keep your account credentials secure.

rules.age: You must be at least 18 years old to use our Service
rules.responsibility: You are responsible for all activity under your account
rules.security: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access

auction.title: 3. Auction Rules
auction.content: All bids placed on our platform are binding. By placing a bid, you agree to purchase the item at your bid price if you are the winning bidder.

rules.retraction: Bids cannot be retracted once placed
rules.winning: The highest bidder at auction close wins
rules.fees: Buyer's premium (5%) applies to all winning bids
rules.payment: Payment must be completed within 3 business days

payment.title: 4. Payment Terms
payment.content: Accepted payment methods include bank wire transfer and credit cards. Full payment must be received before shipping can commence. Failure to pay may result in account suspension.

shipping.title: 5. Shipping & Delivery
shipping.content: AWA arranges international shipping on behalf of buyers. Shipping quotes are estimates and final costs may vary. Risk of loss transfers to buyer upon departure from Japan.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: AWA provides inspection reports in good faith but does not guarantee the accuracy of all information. Buyers are encouraged to conduct their own due diligence. Our liability is limited to the amount of fees paid to AWA.

governing.title: 7. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of Japan. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: Sorry, something went wrong on our end.

story.title: üèçÔ∏è Our Story
story.text1: AWA (All World Action) was founded with a simple mission: to connect motorcycle enthusiasts worldwide with the finest Japanese motorcycles. What started as a passion project has grown into a trusted platform serving riders in over 120 countries.
story.text2: Based in Japan, we have direct access to premium auctions and exclusive inventory, allowing us to offer bikes that are difficult to find elsewhere at competitive prices.

mission.title: üéØ Our Mission
mission.text: To make owning a quality Japanese motorcycle accessible to riders everywhere, with complete transparency, professional service, and unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Honest inspections, clear pricing, no hidden fees

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: Only the best motorcycles make it to our platform

trust.title: Trust
trust.desc: Building lasting relationships with our customers

whyChoose.title: üèÜ Why Choose AWA?

whyChoose.expertInspectionDesc: Every bike is professionally inspected and documented
whyChoose.endToEndDesc: From bidding to delivery, we handle everything
whyChoose.multilingualSupportDesc: Service in English, Japanese, and Arabic

bidding.title: üèçÔ∏è About Bidding
bidding.q1: How do I place a bid?
bidding.a1: After creating an account, browse our catalog and click "Bid" on any motorcycle. Enter your bid amount (minimum $20 increment) and confirm.
bidding.q2: What is the minimum bid increment?
bidding.a2: The minimum bid increment is $20 USD.
bidding.a3: Auctions close every Tuesday at 17:00 JST. Check the Auction Calendar for timezone conversions.
bidding.a4: Bids are binding and cannot be cancelled.

payment.title: üí≥ Payment
payment.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a1: Currently we accept bank wire transfers. Credit card and payment plans are coming soon.
payment.q2: How long do I have to pay?
payment.a2: Payment must be completed within 5 business days of receiving your invoice.
payment.a3: All prices are in USD. We accept payments in USD, EUR, and GBP.

shippingFaq.title: üö¢ Shipping
shippingFaq.a1: Shipping times vary: UAE 3-4 weeks, Egypt 5-6 weeks, UK 6-8 weeks. See Shipping Information.
shippingFaq.a2: Yes, all shipments include marine insurance.
shippingFaq.a3: We provide all export documentation. Customs clearance at destination is the buyer's responsibility.

inspectionFaq.title: üîç Inspection & Quality
inspectionFaq.a1: Every motorcycle undergoes a comprehensive inspection covering visual, mechanical, and electrical systems.
inspectionFaq.q2: What does the condition grade mean?
inspectionFaq.a2: We use grades S (Excellent) to D (Poor). See Inspection Services for details.

supportFaq.title: üìû Support
supportFaq.a1: Email: info@awa.com | Phone: +1 (800) AWA-BIKE | We offer 24/7 support in English, Japanese, and Arabic.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
stillHaveQuestions.subtitle: Our support team is here to help.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We're here to help you find your dream bike
contactPage.intro: Have questions about an auction? Need help with shipping? Our team is available 24/7.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent! We will contact you shortly.

inspectionPage.title: Inspection Services
inspectionPage.subtitle: Professional 80+ point inspection for every motorcycle
inspectionPage.intro: At AWA, we believe transparency is key. That's why every motorcycle listed on our platform undergoes a rigorous inspection process by certified mechanics.

step1.title: Visual Inspection
step1.desc: Detailed check of exterior condition, scratches, rust, and cosmetic damage.

step2.title: Mechanical Check
step2.desc: Engine start test, noise check, oil leak inspection, and transmission test.

step3.title: Electrical Systems
step3.desc: Verification of lights, indicators, horn, and battery voltage.

step4.title: Frame & Suspension
step4.desc: Check for frame damage, fork seals, and suspension functionality.

s.desc: Brand new, never used. Showroom condition.

5.desc: Like new. Low mileage, excellent condition.

4.desc: Good condition. Minor scratches or wear consistent with age.

3.desc: Average condition. Noticeable scratches, rust, or repair history.

2.desc: Rough condition. Needs significant repairs or restoration.

1.desc: Salvage / Parts bike. Non-running or major damage.

report.title: Comprehensive Report
report.desc: Every listing includes a downloadable inspection sheet detailing every flaw found.

cta.title: Buy with Confidence
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied dealers and riders.

financingPage.title: Financing Options
financingPage.subtitle: Flexible payment solutions for your business
financingPage.intro: We understand that cash flow is critical for dealers. AWA offers flexible financing and credit terms to help you manage your inventory and grow your business.

plan1.title: Deferred Payment
plan1.desc: Pay 30% upfront and the remaining 70% upon arrival at your port.

plan2.title: Revolving Credit
plan2.desc: A continuous line of credit for frequent buyers with established history.

plan3.title: Letter of Credit
plan3.desc: We accept L/C from major international banks for large volume orders.

partners.title: Our Financial Partners
partners.desc: We work with leading global banks to ensure secure and smooth transactions.

cta.title: Apply for Financing
cta.subtitle: Contact our finance team to check your eligibility.

shippingPage.title: Global Shipping
shippingPage.subtitle: Safe and reliable delivery to over 120 countries
shippingPage.intro: AWA handles the complexities of international logistics so you don't have to. From our yard to your port, we ensure your motorcycles are transported safely and efficiently.

feature1.title: Door-to-Port
feature1.desc: Seamless value chain from auction house to your nearest international port.

feature2.title: Container Vanning
feature2.desc: Professional vanning services to maximize space and ensure safety during transit.

feature3.title: Documentation
feature3.desc: Complete export documentation handling including Bill of Lading and Export Certificates.

feature4.title: Insurance
feature4.desc: Comprehensive marine insurance coverage included for peace of mind.

cookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.intro: AWA uses cookies to improve your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.desc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the website remember your actions and preferences over a period of time.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.desc: Necessary for the website to function properly. Includes login sessions and security features.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.desc: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant ads.

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.desc: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

videoGuidesPage.title: Video Guides
videoGuidesPage.subtitle: Learn how to use AWA Auction effectively
videoGuidesPage.intro: Watch our step-by-step tutorials to master the AWA platform. From bidding strategies to understanding inspection reports, we've got you covered.

guide1.title: How to Register
guide1.desc: A quick walkthrough of the registration and verification process.

guide2.title: Placing Your First Bid
guide2.desc: Learn how to search for bikes and place bids in real-time.

guide3.title: Reading Inspection Reports
guide3.desc: Understand our grading system and how to interpret inspection sheets.

guide4.title: Shipping Process Explained

story1.name: MotoWorld UK
story1.quote: AWA's inspection reports are so detailed, I feel like I'm inspecting the bike myself. Our sales have increased by 40% since switching.

story2.name: Dublin Bikes
story2.quote: The shipping support is phenomenal. Door-to-port service saves us countless hours of logistics work.

story3.name: Desert Riders
story3.quote: Finding high-quality vintage Japanese bikes was hard until we found AWA. Their inventory is unmatched.
